name: 1121 Golden Sella Basmati rice
description:
Extra-Long Grains: Naturally aromatic grains that elongate beautifully when cooked.

Non-Sticky & Fluffy: The sella process keeps grains separate and firm, ideal for premium dishes.

Rich Aroma & Taste: Traditional basmati fragrance with a subtle nutty flavor.

High Nutritional Value: Parboiled to lock in essential nutrients and improve digestion.

Perfectly Aged: Expertly aged to enhance texture, aroma, and cooking performance.
meta_title: 1121 basmati rice ( Golden sella) - Patel Universal Traders PVT.LTD.

name: Chili (Capsicum spp.) – Guntur / Byadgi / Kashmiri
description:
Forms: Whole Dried, Powder, Flakes

Key Specifications: Moisture ≤ 12%, Capsaicin ≥ 0.2%, ASTA Color ≥ 70

Origin: Andhra Pradesh (Guntur), Karnataka (Byadgi), J&K (Kashmir)

Packaging: 25kg PP/Jute Bags

Shelf Life: 18–24 months

Certification: Spices Board, APEDA

Markets: China, UAE, UK, Malaysia

Notes: Guntur Teja and Byadgi are leading export varieties.
meta_title: Chili (Capsicum spp.) – Guntur / Byadgi / Kashmiri - Prime Impex

name: Turmeric (Curcuma longa) – Erode / Salem / Sangli
description:
Forms: Whole (Finger), Powder

Key Specifications: Moisture ≤ 12%, Curcumin 3–5%

Origin: Tamil Nadu (Erode, Salem), Maharashtra (Sangli), Telangana (Nizamabad)

Packaging: 25kg PP/Jute Bags

Shelf Life: 24 months
